div.style: position:fixed;z-index:99999999999999999;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;background: url("http://www.hookit.com/assets/images/ui/preloader/bar-large-green.gif") center center no-repeat, url("http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-llGFzd7eQYM/U7LOweElCiI/AAAAAAAAI28/ruM0o_6IoFI/s1600/wecommerce-logo-smaller.png") center 40% no-repeat;background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.93);background-size:220px;

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "
